message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested but I'm looking to pay closer to $8500.  What do you think?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $8750.
